text: The 1978 Vuelta a España was the 33rd edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Gijón, with a prologue individual time trial on 25 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 6 May with a stage from Calafell. The race finished in San Sebastián on 14 May. ==Stage 11a== 6 May 1978 — Calafell to Barcelona, {| |Stage 11a result {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team !
